channel.title: Duel

item.title: Duel
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, whenever you win a duel on my server, it gives you the reward but it only teleports you out of the arena whenever your opponent logs out, how can I fix it? This is the method I have to make it so you teleport out of the arena but it doesnâ€™t work obviously, there are no errors in the compiler either.

c.freezeTimer = 3; c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); duelRewardInterface(); c.getPA().showInterface(6733); c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 3); c.getPA().createPlayerHints(10, -1); c.canOffer = true; c.duelSpaceReq = 0; c.duelingWith = 0; c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); c.duelRequested = false; }

Read full topic
